snippet: Telcordia, owned by the telecom giant Ericsson, accused its rival, Neustar, of fear-mongering and spreading misinformation by raising national security concerns about the deal.
lead_paragraph: Telcordia, owned by the telecom giant Ericsson, accused its rival, Neustar, of fear-mongering and spreading misinformation by raising national security concerns about the deal.

headline.main: Swedish-Owned Firm Defends Bid for Sensitive U.S. Phone Contract
